name: Defaults for BuddyPress Docs
author: Venutius

sections.description:
This plugin adds a Defaults menu option to BuddyPress Docs, allowing the default sort order and docs per page settings to be changed.

This plugin requires BuddyPress and BuddyPress Docs.
sections.installation:
Option 1.

  1. From the Dashboard>>Plugins>>Add New page, search for Defaults for BuddyPress Docs.
  2. When you have located the plugin, click on “Install” and then “Activate”.
  3. Visit the Dashboard>>BP Docs>>Defaults to change the default view for BuddyPress Docs.

With the zip file:

Option 2

  1. Upzip the plugin into it’s directory/file structure
  2. Upload Defaults for BuddyPress Docs structure to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Admin>>Plugins menu.
  4. Visit the Dashboard>>BP Docs>>Defaults to change the default view for BuddyPress Docs.

Option 3

  1. Go to Admin>>Plugins>>Add New>>Upload page.
  2. Select the zip file and choose upload.
  3. Activate the plugin.
  4. Visit the Dashboard>>BP Docs>>Defaults to change the default view for BuddyPress Docs.
